mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.type, t.numerical_order, t.mortgager, t.guarantee_name, t.guarantee_address, t.guarantee_money, t.guarantee_area, t.pledge_pepole, t.register_time, t.logout_time, t.logout_type, t.internet_content_provider, t.data_connect_pepole
